thread.section_title: Libertel Montmartre Opera - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Lovely
thread.title_full: Lovely - Review of Libertel Montmartre Opera, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: cardiff_f
title: Lovely
text:
Booked this hotel (privilege room) at last minute and it was lovely.
Friendly helpful reception staff, quick and easy check in, spacious and modern room with all the amenities (safe, fridge, tea & coffee making facilities, v large tv).
I was on the ground floor and so there was a bit of street noise but you are in Paris after all so that should be expected.
Vibrant area close to moulin rouge and metro with lots of choices of restaurants nearby.
Would definitely stay here again.
